description:
go.crypto/ssh/terminal: support Go 1.0.

For those still stuck on Go 1.0.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto/

Please put a comment

panic("unreachable") // for Go 1.0

so no one removes it later.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3b780a7120c9&repo=crypto ***

go.crypto/ssh/terminal: support Go 1.0.

For those still stuck on Go 1.0.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11297043

subject: code review 11297043: go.crypto/ssh/terminal: support Go 1.0.
